description: Sometimes you have to wave while you’re hiding behind something. For those cases, I guess you’d use these dongers? I feel like this situation does not come up all that often but hey, you never know. At least there is a donger for every imaginable, possible situation. 川o･-･)ﾉ ┻┳|･ω･)ﾉ ]ｮ◡◕ั⁎)ﾉ✰⁎* |ʘ‿ʘ)╯ |･ω･`*)ッ |/// |(ω･ )ﾉ| ///| |/// |ω･｀*)ﾉ| ///| |｡･益･)ﾉ
title: Hiding
